description: The number of dispositions issued by local courts for "violation of probation" proceedings during the reporting period.  Categorized by type of disposition: jail (revocation); prison (revocation); restored (probation continued); terminated (probation sentence ended).

name: DOP Adult Violations of Probation Disposed by Calendar Year
